metadata.title: CVE-2019-13147 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Audio File Library (aka audiofile) 0.3.6, there exists one NULL pointer dereference bug in ulaw2linear_buf in G711.cpp in libmodules.a that allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

notes.note: ebarretto> It looks like upstream is not active anymore, some of the open CVEs have a proposed fix on a fork. Marking as deferred for now.

criterions.comment: audiofile package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021-06-29').
